was USD8.75 a share, exceeding the USD8.08 average analyst estimate. Meanwhile, revenue jumped 26 percent to USD8.44 billion from USD6.67 billion in the fourth quarter in 2009. His comments were among the last he made as CEO of the search firm, with Google announcing that co-founder Larry Page would step into Eric Schmidt 's shoes as CEO, while Eric Schmidt becomes executive chairman.
